text: There are 3 arrondissements in the Aube department. The arrondissements of Aube are: Arrondissements of Aube INSEE code Arrondissement Capital Population (2014) Area (km²) Density (Inh./km²) Communes 101 Bar-sur-Aube Bar-sur-Aube 28,733 1,193.3 104 102 Nogent-sur-Seine Nogent-sur-Seine 54,177 1,245.3 80 123 Troyes Troyes 225,184 3,565.7 247 ==History== Since its creation, the Aube department has had few changes: * 1790 : creation of the department with six districts: Nogent-sur- Seine, Arcis-sur-Aube, Bar-sur-Aube, Bar-sur-Seine, Ervy and Troyes; the capital was Troyes. * 1800 : creation of five arrondissements: Arcis-sur-Aube, Bar-sur-Aube, Bar-sur-Seine, Nogent-sur-Seine and Troyes. * 1926 : the arrondissements of Arcis-sur-Aube et Bar-sur-Seine were eliminated. ==Related pages== *List of arrondissements of France ==References== Aube
title: Arrondissements of the Aube department
